meanings.sent1: The two puzzle pieces were nonsuperimposable because they didn't fit together.
meanings.sent2: The nonsuperimposable images on the screen created a unique visual effect.
meanings.sent3: The nonsuperimposable socks made it look like the person was wearing mismatched pairs.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsuperimposable ideas clashed with the traditional methods.
meanings.sent5: The nonsuperimposable patterns on the fabric stood out in a sea of plain designs.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being placed on top of something else in such a way that all parts coincide.
meanings.sent1: The nonsuperimposable layers of the cake made it look uneven.
meanings.sent2: The nonsuperimposable shapes of the blocks didn't stack neatly.
meanings.sent3: The nonsuperimposable jigsaw pieces made completing the puzzle a challenge.
meanings.sent4: His nonsuperimposable opinions clashed with those of his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The nonsuperimposable shadows cast by the trees created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
